    Seminar in Cognitive Science:

    • AI in Creativity - This paper explores the application of AI in creativity, focusing on computer-generated images and natural language processing, to enhance human understanding and utilization of creativity.

    Cognition: Notes & Assignments

    • unconscious Inference in Perception - A short paper that explains how our brain fills in missing information and makes assumptions based on incomplete visual stimuli.
